info.name: iSPARQL Dark-Blue
info.description:
A Dark-blue style for ISPARQL webform. the style consider balance of contrast.

it helps people who uses ISPARQL webform to preform query heavily 
and their eyes are tired from bright screens. 

it considers your eyes.

Take care of them wisely
info.additionalInfo:
alpha. dev.

May not be perfect, but functional.
